statements: UPDATE shipping_costs SET distance = 100, weight = 10, delivery_speed = 'Standard' WHERE distance = 50;
UPDATE shipping_costs SET weight = 15, delivery_speed = 'Express', distance = 150 WHERE weight = 10;
UPDATE shipping_costs SET delivery_speed = 'express' WHERE distance > 100 AND weight <= 50;
UPDATE shipping_costs SET delivery_speed = 'standard', weight = 75 WHERE distance <= 100;
UPDATE ShippingCosts SET distance = 250.75, delivery_speed = 'Express' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE TransportationCompanies SET website = 'www.companyxyz.com', location = 'City ABC' WHERE company_id = 5;
UPDATE ShippingCosts SET delivery_speed='Express' WHERE distance > 100 AND weight <= 10;
UPDATE TransportationCompanies SET location='New Address', website='www.newwebsite.com' WHERE company_id = 3;
UPDATE shipping_costs SET weight = 5.7, delivery_speed = 'express' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE distance_cost_rates SET cost_per_unit_distance = 0.15, distance_range = '100-200 miles' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE shipping_costs SET weight = 25.5, delivery_speed = 'Express' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE distance_cost_rates SET distance_range = '100-200 miles', cost_per_unit_distance = 3.75 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE ShippingCompanies SET company_location='New York' WHERE company_id=1;
UPDATE Shipments SET distance=750.25, weight=120.50 WHERE shipment_id=100;
UPDATE ShippingCompanies SET company_name = 'New Shipping Company Name' WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE ShippingRates SET rate = 25.50 WHERE rate_id = 3 AND company_id = 1;
UPDATE Distance SET distance = 120 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Weight SET weight = 5.50 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Distance SET distance = 1500.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Weight SET weight = 3.25 WHERE item_name = 'Box';
